slides.speech: Welcome to the .Net Angular Course. This intensive training will equip you with essential web development skills, utilizing the powerful .Net framework and Angular. We will navigate the fascinating world of frontend and backend development, interact with databases, services, and APIs, and create responsive, user-friendly applications. Whether you are a beginner or have some experience, this course is designed to make you proficient and confident in your web development abilities. So prepare yourself for an exciting journey of learning, innovation, and career growth with .Net and Angular

objects.text:
Learn web development skills
with .Net framework and Angular
in this intensive course

slides.speech: Welcome, learners! In this chapter of .Net Angular, we're going to delve into creating your first API in .Net. With step-by-step guidance, we'll traverse from basic concepts to practical implementation. It's a key skill in modern application development, essential for achieving efficient software functionality. Let's dive in!

objects.text:
This chapter outlines the
basics of creating your first
API using .NET, including a
step-by-step process and key
concepts

slides.speech: Open Visual Studio 2022 and start a new project. Use the ASP.NET Core Web API template to create your first .Net API.  For your first .Net API, name your project, select the location, target .NET 6 as your framework, review all settings, then hit 'Create'.

objects.text:
Firstly, launch Visual Studio 2022,
create a new project using template:
ASP.NET Core Web API for building APIs

Designate your project name and
location, ensure .NET 6 is your target
framework, review project settings, and
then click 'Create'

slides.speech: To create a .Net API, go to 'Controllers' in the solution explorer, add a new 'API Controller - Empty', name it, and click 'Add'.

objects.text:
Expand solution explorer, right-click
'Controllers', select 'Add -
Controller', choose 'API Controller -
Empty', name your controller, then
click 'Add'

slides.speech: Welcome to .NET Angular. We'll explore fundamental concepts, API creation roles, and highlight .NET 6 features pertaining to our first API creation in .NET Let's dive into crafting your first .NET API. I'll guide you through the environment setup process and initial API creation. Let's begin.

objects.text:
Begin by introducing the learners to
.NET Angular, elaborating on its basic
concepts, role in api creation, and
highlighting some key features of .NET
6

Proceed on to practical demonstrations;
Guide learners through step-by-step
instructions on setting up their
environments and crafting their first
.NET API

slides.speech: Let's delve into creating effective, clear, and efficient .NET APIs, setting an initial blueprint for beginners to follow. Gain consistency and code clarity now

objects.text:
Finally, establish initial guidelines,
best practices and standards for
crafting .NET APIs; This fosters
consistency, efficiency, and code
clarity amongst beginner learners
